Zero tuning and always efficient and performant

The Pure Storage platform is truly autonomous by design, offering self-tuning performance and continuously optimized data layouts without human intervention. Built on a purpose-built operating system—the Purity Operating Environment—and DirectFlash hardware, it ensures peak efficiency and sustainability, scaling effortlessly with near-zero management. It also delivers peak performance without the need for complex HPC science projects or the complications of hybrid systems, seamlessly supporting multiple access patterns at once.
